description:
South Tokyo receives their invitations for the Pantasia Rookie Competition, a tournament for all Pantasia newcomers to vie for baking supremacy. After feeling like he can’t match Kazuma, Tsukino helps Kawachi train to acquire the Gauntlets of the Sun.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kawachi Prime!! The Gauntlets of the Sun!
Kyôsuke nouvelle version !! Les gants solaires !
คาวาจิคนใหม่ กับปลอกแขนตะวัน
河内改!! 太陽のガントレット!
